pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Micro Sculpting Cream Fragrance Free 48g New Formula
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Face Cream Moisturiser Fragrance Free is a moisturiser that firms, plumps & reduces wrinkles. Firmer, plumper skin from first use.


Features:
- Formula, with Advanced Amino-Peptide Complex + Carob Fruit Extract, helps renew skin's surface
- Hyaluronic Acid + Glycerol hydrates for plumper skin
- Look up to 10 years younger in just 28 days
- Firmer, plumper skin in 28 days

How it works:
Day 01 Visibly reduces pores, improves texture & radiance.
Day 14 Noticeably firmer skin.
Day 28 Visibly reduces lines & wrinkles.


 

Size: 48g

Fragrance Free?: Yes

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Niacinamide, Isopropyl Isostearate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Nylon-12, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polyethylene, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Titanium Dioxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Mica, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Dimethiconol, Polyacrylamide, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Fruit Extract, PEG-100 Stearate, Propylparaben, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium PEG-7 Olive Oil Carboxylate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, C12-13 Pareth-3, Laureth-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4.

Directions

Using your fingertips, massage a small amount on the face al IL neck in an upward circular motion. focusing on areas like the brow and jaw line, which need more support. Use morning and night.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:

1. Cleanser: Designed to gently remove dirt and make-up leaving skin purified and prepared for the rest of your routine.
2. Serum / Essence: Designed to be lightweight so they can be layered on the skin before your traditional moisturiser. Easily absorbs and delivers anti-ageing ingredients into skin's epidermis layer.
3. Moisturiser: Designed for long-lasting hydration and offered in 3 types - Day, UV, and Night.
4. Eye / Treatment Eye: Use after your moisturiser to hydrate the eye area and address key eye concerns.
5. Treatment: Specially designed with advanced ingredients/technology to treat specific skin concerns. Add these to further customise your skincare regimen.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
